snippet.title: Orange Moon Trailer
snippet.description:
Orange Moon is a fast-paced 2D action platformer game filled with exciting RPG elements and challenging puzzles. Your mission is to make your way through landscapes filled with dangerous native life forms, raiders, remnants of alien civilizations and harsh environments. As you take this epic journey you will search for new life, natural resources and alien artifacts, as well as build up your arsenal of weapons to exploit each enemy's weakness. Engage in head-to-head combat with the likes of carnivorous plants and smart robotic mining equipment. But be warned ... it won't be that easy to battle your way to victory!

Learn more about Orange Moon at 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/432950/Orange_Moon/
http://www.indiedb.com/games/orange-moon
http://www.betelgeusezero.com/orangemoongame
